Control Statement: The organization employs and maintains fire suppression and detection devices/systems for the information system that are supported by an independent energy source.Supplemental Guidance:  This control applies primarily to facilities containing concentrations of information system resources including, for example, data centers, server rooms, and mainframe computer rooms. Fire suppression and detection devices/systems include, for example, sprinkler systems, handheld fire extinguishers, fixed fire hoses, and smoke detectors.References: None.
